name: B-Bobs
overview: An arcade style single screen platformer for one or two players, published in Golden Disk 64 #12 (1990). Behead your way through the mysterious world of the dangerous wizard Aroon. An action-packed jump-and-run game, with 10 amazing levels and a powerful bonus level. A real fun game! Collect coins, head the stones with your steel helmet. Funny gameplay, great graphics and great sound - everything in this game! A real hit!
